entry.title: 程序员的第一个网站
entry.content: Welcome to IT Dream Works! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using IT Dream Works, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ itdreamworks new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ itdreamworks server More info: Server Generate static files1$ itdreamworks generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ itdreamworks deploy More info: Deployment
